content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with fuel: coal (18), status: NO_INGREDIENTS, warnings: no ingredients to smelt.

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with fuel: coal (6), status: NO_INGREDIENTS, warnings: no ingredients to smelt.

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts iron gear wheels.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items before attempting to insert. The maximum inventory for furnaces is 50 items, and if it is full, insertion will fail.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure there are enough items in the furnace to extract. If the furnace is empty or has insufficient items, extraction will fail.

### Common errors with furnace statuses
- Regularly check the status of furnaces to ensure they have the necessary ingredients to smelt. If they show NO_INGREDIENTS, consider supplying them with the required materials.

### Errors when crafting
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. If you run out of materials, crafting will not be successful.
